title: How to Survive Your Crappy Job | Tom Bilyeu AMA
description: Tom answers questions from the community. Impact Theory is proudly sponsored by Skillshare. Start learning on Skillshare today at skillshare.com/impact Tom Bilyeu AMA’s are Live on Facebook and YouTube every Friday at 10 am PST. You can submit your questions in advance to connect@impacttheory.com, with the subject line “AMA Question”. BOOKS MENTIONED Grit by Angela Duckworth: https://amzn.to/2HW6Vbp [11:20] QUESTION TOPICS Tom addresses how to keep spirits up when working from job to job. [00:13] How Tom changes the question from giving value to doing things that make you feel most alive, then adding value. [02:28] Tom discusses two different types of people: one who does everything and on who does nothing. [04:58] Tom explains how you should act when given a "needs significant improvement" performance appraisal. [08:39-10:54] How Tom uses mediation to DO THE WORK! [10:54] Tom says that life is all about feeling good, feeling amazing. It's about fulfillment. [12:51] Tom explains dopamine as an anticipatory chemical and how it encourages bad habits. [15:41]
